titleStmt.title: A Dialogue, containing a compendious discourse concerning the present designe in the West-Indies. Wherein is demonstrated the lawfulness, or rather necessity of that war, with the unquestionable hopefulness of good success therein. Notwithstanding the obscenity of disaffected and non-experienced persons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Lownds, at the White Lyon in S. Paul's Church-yard, neer the west end,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
